Reviews.Title: My 3rd Samsung
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Walker "Retieree"
Reviews.Content: This Samsung 37" HDTV was purchased for the bedroom. After having purchased a Samsung 46" model A650 I signed up for Direct TV satellite but could not get the same programs (HD) on my old bedroom set. I didn't want to spend a lot of money so I started tracking Amazons listings. Long story short. it's everything I wanted in a second set. The picture is perfect, the price was right with no tax or shipping charge. Excellent clarity. Love this set. I also have a 21" Samsung computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and reasonable price
Reviews.Author: jray
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a smaller than 40 inch set for a bedroom and this tv is the perfect size. Relatively thin so perfect for wall mounting and the picture is excellent. While not up to the LN52A650 by Samsung (and nothing really is) for the price you will not find a better picture than this set. The menu's are easy to navigate. Operation is flawless and with 3 HDMI inputs its got plenty for most applications. This set is less in cost than the 550 model mainly because it doesnt have the side inputs which for me i dont use in the bedroom and would rather save the $100 or so odd dollars. If you wanted them later you could easily run a wallplate with them to a another location which actually makes for a cleaner install. Samsung is the best picture out there and is worth a few extra dollars. I fully expect many years of trouble free service from this set as thats been my experience with this brand. Also register online for their warranty and they add 3 months to the end of it at no cost just for signing up. Would buy this set again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: R. Harris
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV a few weeks ago, specifically because it would just fit in our existing TV cabinet.  We have no complaints about this TV.  The picture quality is excellent, the controls on the remote and the on-screen menu are both very intuitive.  We had no problem figuring out everything about this TV without having to go through the instructions.  The rotating base is convenient. The sound from the TV is good though we normally have it turned down and use the stereo.

Reviews.Title: Very good purchase
Reviews.Author: Elena Boley
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my living room. As the room isn't too big ( 10' by 12') I went for 37" TV. It arrived very quick, within 3 days since the order had been placed. (Delivered by UPS, twice missed me home, had to pick it up myself from UPS facility as they would have sent it back after third delivery attempt).TV is very easy to install and navigate through all the options, works perfectly so far:) I'm really enjoying the quality of this product as I can see the channels in HDformat, the picture is really clear and perfect. Connecting DVD player was not a problem, so now I also watch movies etc on this big screen. Highly recommended for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: L. Nance
Reviews.Content: Just like the other 2 Samsung TVs I have,this one did not disappoint me. Great picture, good TV for the bedroom.  It took me about 30 minutes to hang it on the wall with the Peerless PA740 Articulating Wall Mount.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Well first and foremost this is a good tv for a good price. The colors and picture is amazing especially if you are going to watch tv and movies with it. One downside is that they seem to have a high chance of having Backlight Bleeding(parts of the screen are brighter or lighter than others) but that common with all LCD tv's.NOW WITH THAT ALL SAID!!!!DO NOT BUY THIS TV IF YOU PLAN ON USING IT FOR GAMING!!!!!!!!That is exactly why I purchased this tv, it has such great reviews because most people use it for movies or tv, for that its fine BUT NOT FOR GAMING!. I got this TV for Christmas and I am now currently returning it because it just cant play games. DONT LET THAT GAME MODE FUNCTION FOOL YOU...IT LITERALLY DOES NOTHING.The problem with is is that it has SEVERE ghosting..meaning if your playing a game (especially FPS) and you move with any speed at all the images double up so it looks really blurry. Especially in dark (dark as in, in the game dark) rooms.For example if you are playing rock band and your singing or something and the words are scrolling on the screen, they are EXTREMELY blurry and will give you a headache in no time.Again if your not planning on using it for games this tv will do ABOVE AND BEYOND what you need. Otherwise DONT BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: positive
Reviews.Author: GERRY
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this purchase.  The picture quality is  very good with a couple, minor exceptions.  Even though the TV comes with a "set" normal, picture, I'm still learning to adjust it for even better picture (color on faces too much I feel).  After 2 weeks viewing I still haven't called in cable company to "set up" and give me HD.This tells how much I'm satisfied now with the set. The only thing I don't like is the remote dosen't have the "main" buttons in consumer friendly position.  ie. the mute buttom, the change back channel button are somewhat hidden when they should be put in a easy position on remote. I do recommend this TV.GERRYNEW Samsung LN37B530 37-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: Received product in 3 days-Happy
Reviews.Author: Billy Profitt
Reviews.Content: Ordered samsung tv arrived in 3 days. Excellent tv and always got good service from using Amazon. Thatis why I order from Amazon, good company and they back what they sell

Reviews.Title: Great Affordable TV
Reviews.Author: J. McCarty "Kat Man"
Reviews.Content: Vendor (ABT Electronics) was awesome...the Samsung itself rocks!  Picture extremely crisp and sound exceeds expectations.  Would like to have another one!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 37" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Wall "Wall"
Reviews.Content: AWESOME TV! In December we purchased the 52" version and are currently in the process of upgrading all of our TV's to the Samsungs. Fantastic picture, quality, etc. I highly recommend any of the Samsung LCD HDTV's!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: digitalartist "artist"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, usable right out of the box.Fantastic picture, size is great for 8-10 foot away. only small complaint is thatI have to turn up the sound high to hear it.Insist that they unpack and set up and turn on. They tried to deliver and get us to signwith out looking it it. it's large remote is full of great user buttons.I'm very happy with purchase and price.Delivery was fast, but don't sit and wait for it, call the delivery company once you get the notice to check on it.fine print says that the notice is only for them getting it not you getting it delivered.

Reviews.Title: Geat TV.  Crisp Image.  Poor internal speakers
Reviews.Author: Chris H
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Samsung LNXXB530 TV.  I think Samsung nailed it with this TV line.  Everytime someone walks into my house and watches either tv, they end up telling me how great of a picture it is.  I watch plenty of football and basketball, and have never felt the desire to go buy a 120Hz tv after owning either of these.  I could not vouch for hockey, but there is never a "tail" on the football or basketball.The picture is bright and crisp, but the internal speakers are no good.  The first Samsung we purchased was hooked straight into a surround sound system so we never even checked how the internal speakers worked.  The second (the LN37B530), was hung in our bedroom, where we did not have an external speakers to plug into.The internal speakers don't handle high bass or treble very well (so don't try to blast your ears off during an action movie with it) but are suitable for watching everyday TV.  In our bedroom, since the walls are closer in, the reverberation helps move the sound around.  Just to make sure we didn't have a faulty TV we unplugged the first TV from the surround sound to test its internal speakers.  In our larger living room, they performed miserably.  With no close walls for sound to bounce off of, the sound performance is no good.I would not buy any flat screen (LCD, Plasma, LED, or other) for its internal speaker performance, they are all probably no good.  This TV has a GREAT picture and is great for any tv, movies, or sports you may watch.CEVA SHIPPING NOTE:On a side note, the company AMAZON.COM used to ship this TV was CEVA.  CEVA was HORRIBLE.  I began calling CEVA the day the order was due, and had to hassle them to get my tv to me 4 days late.  They lost track of my shipment (didn't know if it had unloaded on a dock or was still on a truck) for those 4 days.  If you buy from amazon.com and use the free shipping, make sure to stay on top of tracking your package if you want to get it in a timely manner.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV Grat Amazon price and Service
Reviews.Author: tootsie
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase, it was ordered ten days ago...showed up 3 days later at the time and location of my choice so I didnt have to worry about a delivery left at my doorstep.It has a terrific picture, and decent speakers but I will more than likely buy external speakers for it.Great price and free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a flat screen TV and did some research on the features I wanted.  I knew I would be using a dvd player (getting a blu-ray later) and watching sports.  The contrast ratio is good, colors are great, sports look great on this TV.  I haven't upgraded my cable service to HD yet but it looks great as is.  120hz is obviously better but the 6ms refresh rate compensates well.  There are some better features out there but to me it seemed like the law of diminishing returns.  I could spend an extra $300 or $400 but not really notice any better picture quality.I had a good experience with the delivery.  You do have to be home to accept delivery but CEVA called to set up a delivery time and they arrived on time.  The man who delivered it was curteous and even attached the base and set it on my stand.  I will definitely order my next TV from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: VERY BEST PICTURE
Reviews.Author: M. Brown
Reviews.Content: After doing extensive research about HDTV's both visually and with online reviews the hands down winner was Samsung.The picure and sound is simply stunning and Samsung customer service was very helpful AND they spoke clear English.The main reason I didn't even look at Sony's was all the very negative reviews about their customer service.Trust me Samsung HDTV's are the cream of the crop.

Reviews.Title: 37 inch Samsung 1080p LCD
Reviews.Author: VCU Ram Fan
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift.  Great picture and Amazon's price beat Sam's Club by $100.  The remote and menu with this TV are very intuitive and easy to use...even easier than the settings for my Sony.  The swivel base is a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: marissa
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is clear and excellent.  Everything is as expected.  Was trying to decide between a Sony or a Samsung and I think I definitely made the perfect choice!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Diane E. Tatum "TatumLight"
Reviews.Content: We finally made the leap to wide screen hi-def! We did a lot of research before we bought and the reviews were right. Sound and picture quality are A-1. 1080p is ahead of the curve (as we were advised) and occasionally there is stutter, with live TV in particular. Amazon delivered on time and in perfect condition. The adult children are ecstatic, and we can't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: C. Mueller
Reviews.Content: researched this tv.  amazon had lowest price with free shipping and no tax.  the tv was ordered on a friday morning and arrive at my home on monday!  very happy with the tv itself.  perfect size.  looks great!

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: D. H. Miller
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is a good TV.  Its got a good picture and good sound quality.  The only real reason I gave it a 4 vs. 5 is it could have a couple more inputs and could autodetect source signal like some other brands.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG HDTV
Reviews.Author: greycap
Reviews.Content: SAMSUNG's media products are far superior to their kitchen appliances. Everyone I talked to that had a SAMSUNG TV and bought a fridge, microwave or DW based on the TV's reputation, has found the electronics in the appliances have a higher failure rate.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Matthew Mccue
Reviews.Content: Very nervous about buying a TV online.  The whole transaction exceeded my expectations from the promptness of the delivery to the quality of the TV.

Reviews.Title: VERY SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: Orman Surina
Reviews.Content: WE ARE VERY SATISFIED WITH OUR NEW SAMSUNG 37 INCH HD TV.WE RECEIVED IT ABOUT 4 WEEKS AGO SO WE HAVE HAD AMPLE TIME TO VIEW IT.THE PICTURE QUALITY IS EXCELLENT AND WE ARE ALSO PLEASED WITH THE WELL BUILT SOLID STAND SAMSUNG OFFERS.WE RESEARCHED MANY HD TV's AND WE FEEL THE SAMSUNG PICTURE QUALITY AND PRICE GAVE US" THE BEST BANG FOR THE BUCK."

Reviews.Title: Base was cracked
Reviews.Author: John Secrist
Reviews.Content: The TV ihas a great picture, but the base was cracked. It was not bad enough to return but I was disappointed that it is not "as new". The monitor is great otherwise.

Reviews.Title: I'm so happy with this tv!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: C. Riehn
Reviews.Content: My wife and I are so pleased we purchased this tv. We're not the types who randomly search around and just pick the lowest priced item either. We did our research and even went and talked with local retail stores selling the same product. For the money this tv does just as good as higher priced/latest version flat screens that are out there. It's rediculous to pay hundreds more for the same size and no difference in picture quality (but with "latest version" stamped on the box). I would recommend this tv to anyone. We currently use it in our bedroom and it's fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased With Purchase
Reviews.Author: M. Seltzer
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the purchase of the LN37B530.  For the price paid ($604), I felt it was a good value.  Like all LCD sets, a little tweaking is required to get satisfactory skin tones.  I have had a Samsung DLP in my living room for three years, and have been delighted with it, and wanted a set for the bedroom.  I thought a 32-inch set would be on the small side but the 37-inch screen is just right.

Reviews.Title: A good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Silverstein
Reviews.Content: We began our TV search with specific size  requirements so the new set could fit into our existing cabinet in the living room. The television tucks in nicely, and is the largest size that will fit in the existing opening and still not have viewing area loss. The set was not in stock when we ordered, and while we received notice it would be around 2 weeks (we ordered not too much before Christmas), it was actually shipped within 2 to 3 days, there was really no significant wait to have the set back in stock and shipped to us. The shippers brought it in and would have set it up for me, but we declined since the old set was not out yet. The set is great for us. Only needed my husband and I to set it up. It was much harder getting the heavy old set out and on to a new home than getting this one in! It was relatively easy to set up and we had the whole thing done in less than an hour. The picture quality is great, much easier for us to watch from the kitchen which is about 40' away, though it is always preferred to relax on the sofa.  We don't use this set for any gaming, just for movies and watching. For this, it is great and we can still close it away in the cabinet when I don't want to have the look of the TV in the room.  Overall, this is a good set for the price.

Reviews.Title: Right out of the box
Reviews.Author: Peter J. Drachsler
Reviews.Content: This hdtv worked right out of the box. I had asked my young nephew (28) to come over and help me, and all we did was plug it in and I haven't touched a thing since. The one thing that seems to be lacking is speaker power. (Others have noted that.)  I am going to have to buy a speaker bar, or something to boost that.  Otherwise, I'm very happy with Samsung and would buy another product of theirs.Amazon shipped this product in a couple of days, even though they said it would be 10 to 15 days. The price was right and there was no tax and no shipping charges. Amazing.Peter

Reviews.Title: easy installation
Reviews.Author: D. Sheehan
Reviews.Content: Good sharp picture, black blacks, green greens, etc.The best feature was that installation(not wall mounting) was accomplished without help.  Other than the manual, that is.We did need to purchase additional a/v cables to hook up our DVD player, and HDMI for the cable box, which came to an additional $40 or so.Very pleased with the product.  Have enjoyed the NFL playoffs!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: TTruong
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung LCD HDTV for my Dad, and he just loved it. Nice design, great picture, and reasonable price. DVD movies just looked fantastic on this TV, and my Dad only had an up-converting DVD player. I bet blu-ray movies will look even more amazing on this TV. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!
Reviews.Author: Sierra Goodman "http://www.iam-iam-iam.com"
Reviews.Content: This was my first flat screen purchase. I researched and read reviews, went to stores to see the pictures for myself and decided upon this one and am glad I did.  Great picture, great sound, I definately made the right choice!

Reviews.Title: What you see is NOT what you get!
Reviews.Author: D. Demers
Reviews.Content: We purchased a 37 inch Samsung LCD TV.  After shopping around, the sales reps we spoke to consistently rated the Samsung LCD Tv's as the best available.  I have been a long time customer of Amazon.com, satisfied with the company's service, pricing and shipping practices.  However, in this instance, I was decieved when checking the specifications before buying.  Here's what happened.  The store sales reps I spoke with agreed that the 120Hz version of the same TV provides better viewing than the 60 Hz version.  So, when checking specs on the Samsung I bought, I was looking for the 120 Hz version.  The Amazon webpage listed all the features the of the Samsung I purchased.  However, and this is where the deception occurred, I read through the list of specifications.  In every instance but one, the features were listed in bold print on the left side of the screen, except, including the Hz feature.  In this case the feature was listed as 120Hz in bold print and the word "no" in faded, not bold, lettering.  Every other feature was, as listed, on the left hand side of the screen.  In other words, I wa sure I had purchased a 120 Hz TV that actually is a 60Hz TV.  After ordering the item, I re-checked all specs and was dismayed when I saw the word "no" in faded lettering next to the 120 Hz in the  features column.  When I tried, minutes later, to cancel the order, I found a) there was no way to cancel the order, the Amazon.com web site indicated the order could not be cancelled because the order was already in the process of shipping  After looking through the Amazon.com website for a way to cancel my order, the only thing I could do was to refuse to accept the TV when delivered.  That information was difficult to find, and b) I found there is no way to call and talk to someone at Amazon.com.In the end I decided to accept the TV when delivered after researching further on the difference between a 60 and 120 Hz TV.  I learned that my 37 inch version would not be greatly affected.  However, I was very disappointed with the deceptive advertising used by Amazon.com and the less than user-friendly tactics for cancelling an order that had not been shipped.

Reviews.Title: Faulty parts that break after warranty expires
Reviews.Author: HiThere
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 2009 Samsung 37" TV at hhGregg based on a recommendation of a friend of mine. The screen quality was beautiful, but the sound was a bit lacking. Lately I've noticed that when I turn the TV on, the sound comes on, but not the picture. This is just after the one year warranty expired (of course). I have to turn the TV off and on again each time. I found lots of complaints online including a potential class action lawsuit against Samsung for their LCD TVs. [...]. They should have recalled these parts and replaced them at no cost to the customers who already paid a small fortune for their TVs. My last TV lasted 14 years.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN37B530 Review
Reviews.Author: Netbuyer "W"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the purchase from Amazon.com. The best price I can found online.This LCD has been installed in the master bedroom just above the door. It's the biggest size LCD that can fit the area. I am impressed with the quality of Samsung Electronics and I even bought a Samsung blue ray player to match it. Samsung "Anynet" works well across both units. virtually you can just use TV remote to handle all.

Reviews.Title: First HDTV
Reviews.Author: S. Silva "Lone Wolf"
Reviews.Content: This was the first HDTV I have ever bought. Had been looking for something to replace my 12yr old Panasonic TV for the longest. Did a lot of research before deciding on getting this TV. Wanted something that was big enough to replace my 32in but wasn't too big for my room which a 40in or bigger would have been. 37in was just the right size and the right price for a full HD.

Reviews.Title: Ron
Reviews.Author: Ronald Gosciniak
Reviews.Content: I had a 32 SAMSUNG IN MY BEDROOM I PURCHASED 1 AND 1/2 YEARS AGO , FROM AMAZON. MY 32 ZENITH TUBE TV DIED IN MY LIVINGROOM AND THAT SAMSUNG REPLACED IT. I PURCHASED A 37 FOR MY BEDROOM.(YEAH I REALLY NEED A TV THAT BIG IN MY BEDROOM).NO PROBELMS, PERFORMS LIKE ME 32. ITS LIKE A DRIVE IN MOVIE IN MY ROOM.

Reviews.Title: Can't rate; item arrived severely damaged
Reviews.Author: William Quinn "William P Quinn"
Reviews.Content: I would have loved to had the oportunity to rate this item but the 37" Samsung TV arrived with the screen severely damaged from shipping.  I refused delivery and called Amazon to report the problem and Amazon started case file to document the report and track the returned item. I was told that it would take about four weeks for the item to be retuned and a refund issued.After three weeks, I called Amazon who called the shipping company.  I was told that the returned item was still at the Albuquerque shipping warehouse after three weeks - the orignial destination was New York.  Math question of the day: "If it takes three weeks for the returned TV to go 400 miles; how long will it take to ship the TV back to New York from Albuquerque?"In all fairness, Amazon has been very responsive and the Amazon Representative, Amanda, was always pleasant,upbeat, and informative in handling my case.  She also assured me that after four weeks a refund would be issued regardless of where the TV might be in the world.

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: Ricardo A. Dominguez "gatolulu"
Reviews.Content: I got this "super" TV because I trusted Samsung. When I got my TV it came with an issue (a gray rectangle in the middle of the screen), just after I started watching tv.  It didn't let me see the image. I called Samsung tech support and they told me they weren't responsible for that issue. They told me to talk to the seller, Amazon. I wrote two emails to tech service and never received an answer from them. The hell with Samsung service!  I returned the TV to Amazon's distributor. I had the tv for less than 10 days in my hands. Sorry! Don't know what to say. The distributor says they will refund my money when they get the tv back.
